yoast_head_json.title: Industrial IoT (IIoT) Solutions & Services — ITRex
yoast_head_json.description: ITRex crafts custom IIoT solutions for equipment monitoring, asset tracking, supply chain management, and factory automation. Our IIoT development services span consulting, IIoT platform engineering, equipment retrofitting, and IIoT software development. Contact us to discuss your project!
